extendedInfo.description: Find good films. Watch them everywhere. Film Fresh offers brand new releases and classics -- thousands of great Hollywood and independent films, movies from around the world, and kids content, too. Rent and buy on your Android 4.0 tablet with our easy-to-use application. Need help selecting a film? What mood are you in? Try our Film Finder at FilmFresh.com.

reviews.title: Awesome new way to watch movies on the go!
reviews.comment: This app is smooth! The selection of movies is better than anything I\'ve seen. Great quality and reasonable prices. A must have for movie lovers.
reviews.author: A Google User
